CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, August 17, 1946, pg. 17 reads: "Buffoonery To You! - John Adams is quite an actor and he puts on an excellent clown performance for the gigantic Water Circus at Ammon pool, which was a highlight of Frog Week. The show which attracted a record throng was one of the most successful of its kind ever staged in Smoky City and was given by the City Bureau of Recreation in cooperation with the Centre Avenue YMCA, under direction of Pomeroyal C. Fountain.- Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: John Adams, wearing clown costume holding broom and dangling off plank or diving board, with clown in police costume holding stick below, in Ammon pool for the Water Circus
